HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Zdarma pro objednávky hodinek, šperků a příslušenství nad 3 000 Kč. Cena pro objednávky pod tuto hodnotu není uvedena.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Zdarma pro objednávky hodinek, šperků a příslušenství nad 3 000 Kč. Cena pro objednávky pod tuto hodnotu není uvedena.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Zdarma pro objednávky hodinek, šperků a příslušenství nad 3 000 Kč. Cena pro objednávky pod tuto hodnotu není uvedena.

SUMMARY:
SUMMARY: Helveti.cz provides free shipping on all orders of watches, jewelry, and accessories over 3,000 Kč within the Czech Republic. Delivery options include home delivery via Česká pošta, PPL, DPD, and Zásilkovna, as well as pickup from Zásilkovna points and Česká pošta branches. In-store pickup is available at their Prague 7 location, which is open on Saturdays. An express courier service within Prague is offered for 300 Kč, with delivery within 24 hours. Pricing for orders under the free shipping threshold is not specified, nor is information on standard delivery times or COD surcharges.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store offers a special personal delivery service called 'Vezeme hodinky' for high-value watches (over 80,000 Kč) in Prague and the Central Bohemian Region. There are value limits for certain carriers: Zásilkovna has a limit of 20,000 Kč, and DPD has a limit of 50,000 Kč.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated page, outlining the available carriers and the free shipping policy. However, it lacks completeness regarding pricing for smaller orders, standard delivery timeframes, and COD fees. The distinction between parcel shops and parcel lockers is not made.
